DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety DHA-O low elevate triglyceride level healthy adult hypertriglyceridemia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study DHA-O Adults With Hypertriglyceridemia
DOC.criteria: age 1879 fast TG level , 150499 mg/dL baseline DHA intake < 200mg/d active good health recent diagnosis CHD history revascularization within 6mos study use lipid alter medication ( stable statin ) use anticoagulant use omega3 product within 4 week screen serum AST/ALT > 1.5x ULN and/or creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL screen lipid alter food supplement woman pregnant childbearing potential use adequate birth control current use history drug alcohol abuse inability swallow capsule
